info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Lin-CMS using OOPS

200.description: Successful response. A single Book object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the book to delete (传入id删除对应图书)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Book object that needs to be updated

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: 搜索关键字（用于按标题进行关键字搜索）

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16). Default is 5.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in log message.

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Refresh token provided as a Bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: "Authorization: Bearer <refresh_token>"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token using Bearer scheme. Example: "Bearer <access_token>"

200.description: 查询所有可分配的权限

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 请求体：重置用户密码信息

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

400.description: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

message.example: 邮箱已被注册，请重新输入邮箱

400.description: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

message.example: 用户组已存在, 不可创建同名分组

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 请求体：删除多个权限所需的参数

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: 上传的文件，multipart/form-data 中的文件字段。可重复提交同一字段以上传多个文件（request.files.getlist 支持）。
